content.en: Structural optimization: Researchers have been exploring how to optimize the design of steel moment frame structures for various factors such as life cycle cost, performance-based seismic design, and seismic retrofit. To achieve these optimizations, they have been using algorithms such as genetic algorithms, charged system search, harmony search, and particle swarm optimization. These algorithms automate the design process and help find the best solutions for these complex engineering problems.
content.da: Strukturel optimering: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan man kan optimere designet af stålmomentrammekonstruktioner i forhold til forskellige faktorer såsom levetidsomkostninger, præstationsbaseret seismisk design og seismisk renovering. For at opnå disse optimeringer har de brugt algoritmer som genetiske algoritmer, charged system search, harmony search og partikel-sværmoptimering. Disse algoritmer automatiserer designprocessen og hjælper med at finde de bedste løsninger på disse komplekse ingeniørproblemer.
